name: Viktor Vektor
description: Viktor Vektor, orVikfor short, is aripperdocinCyberpunk 2077. Hisclinicis located behindMisty's EsotericainLittle China,Watson. Talented, patient, and professional, Viktor has extendedV's credit on a number of occasions, but never complains. Viktor was once a heavyweight boxer in Watson and a member ofNight City Devils, competing in the Watson Boxing Grand Prix. He eventually came in second place in the finals.He left that life behind, and has come to prefer the relatively straightforward life of a back-alley ripperdoc.
